channel.title: Help with setting defence on rune,dragon and mith gloves
channel.description:
heya guys i've tryed the normal way of setting defence starting wif "gloves" etc....but it doesn't seem to work with the barrows drag and mith etc...if any1 could help with these that would be fantasic
Cheers Dan
